subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Kenny Perry shot a six-under-par 66 on Sunday to finish at 19-under 269, one shot better than Woody Austin and Bubba Watson, to join a short list of multiple champions at the Buick Open in Grand Blanc, Mich. Perry, who won this event in 2001 at Warwick Hills, has 11 victories on the PGA Tour, including the Memorial earlier this month.
